183E9881.Line7.103673: I know of a ritual that will cleanse this evil. Surely this is why the Light has guided me here.

3FBAEEBF.Line5.103673: We must collect these tainted blades and find a suitable place to perform the ritual. Only then will the spirits of these fallen faithful be redeemed.

6874C44E.VoiceDir7.103673: Determined to not lose faith! Gathering courage.

8EB39B3B.Line1.103673: Look there. Blood flows from this blade as though the wound were made moments ago. Hatred has seeped into their very souls.

DEE9C708.VoiceDir1.103673: Worried. Shaken. Understanding how dire the situation is.
